(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (GeneratorFunctionDeclaration 
        (StatementBlock 
          (Statement 
            (Declaration 
              (VariableDeclaration 
                (VariableDeclarator 
                  (Expression 
                    (Number "0")) 
                  (Identifier "index"))))) 
          (Statement 
            (ExpressionStatement 
              (Expression 
                (YieldExpression 
                  (Expression 
                    (Identifier "i"))))))) 
        (Identifier "foo") 
        (FormalParameters)))))
